game.name: DCS: MiG-29 Flaming Cliffs
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: Note: the aircraft model is identical to the Flaming Cliffs 3 module. Owners of FC3 do not need to purchase.The MiG-29 "Fulcrum" is a Russian-designed, twin-engine, supersonic fighter. First operational in the early 1980s, the Fulcrum is a "light weight" fighter, comparable to the American F/A-18 Ho
